title: Coronavirus Updates - Ex-Presidents Push Vaccination & Dr. Peter Hotez Discusses Vaccine Concerns
itunes:title: Coronavirus Updates - Ex-Presidents Push Vaccination & Dr. Peter Hotez Discusses Vaccine Concerns
description:
Four former presidents promote getting vaccinated as Donald Trump remains silent, and Dr. Peter Hotez talks to Jaboukie Young-White about conspiracy theories surrounding COVID-19 vaccines.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
